item.description: Meet at the Brewery at 7pm  ask for table for "Mike"  eat drink then if you want, lets go up to Norwich for the Contra dance. Never been to a contra dance? Me either so it should be fun.  Guess we'd better wear comfortable shoes

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: New Year's Eve Seven Barrel Brewery, then Contra Dance into the New Year!
